name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan docs from scanners in Salesforce & Gmail

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attach documents from flatbed ADF scanners as PDF in Chrome browser from other web apps too: Dropbox, Office 365, QBO, SAP etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan paper documents directly from Salesforce from flatbed, ADF (automatic document feeder) scanners.
